name: Escape From Invaded Earth
description:
Earth has been invaded by outer space creatures, now you must rescue the surviving humans and gathering resources to build an interstellar ship so humanity can start a new life on a new planet.

Inspired by Space Invaders, you will be able to:

- Fight and kill all UFO invaders while protecting the Rescue Shuttle.

- Upgrade your ship hull and damage.

- There's 3 unique UFO to fight against (and much more under development)

 

So take your captain cap and fire up that ship, the survivors are awaiting.

The game is currently on prototype stage, your feedback is needed for its development. 

Feedback form can be accessed in the game.

Controls:

Keyboard: WSAD keys

Mouse.

Credits:

Cutscene and Main Menu Music: Abstraction (check him out on http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/)

Mission City Background: GrafxKid

Everything else: Construct 2 Bundles and me.

Especial thanks to Gabriel Naves, you're awesome!
